description: Usually a visual novel game will have the occassional decision point, where a player can choose from one or more alternatives that influence the outcome of the game. On the assumption that would be the case here, I gave this software a shot. After the internminable conversation with 'the creator', where the ridiculously bad premise of the game is laid out, I have had three further scenes. No decisions of any kind yet. My decision will probably be to not wasting my time.

I thought it was fun. It made me smile and laugh, and it left me inspired. I liked how it explains basic techology terms as you go. In this way it is both entertaining and educational. Perfect for stirring up interest amongst youngsters who may be hearing these terms for the first time.
it's not working in my laptop
summary: it's not opening in my laptop

description: great gam i liked it a lot yipee
